What’s the Average Solar Payback?
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
One of the most common questions we hear is “What is the payback on my solar installation?” For most of us, when we ask a question, we hate the answer “It depends,” but especially in the case of solar, this is the right answer.
Why? Because solar has many variables that can influence how much of a return you see from your system. Let’s take a look.
Understand the Factors That Influence Your Payback Period: <[[http://www.directenergysolar.com/blog/post/what-is-the-average-payback-period-of-a-solar-installation?utm_medium=email&utm_source=solarpayback&utm_campaign=nurture-tk&utm_content=solarpayback-button-understand]]>
